name: Upcycled Sari Gift Bags Handmade From 100% Recycled Pre-loved Vintage Sari For For Wedding and Birthday Present Gift Wrapping
description:
Our upcycled sari gift bags are made from 100% upcycled and unwanted saris and perfect for wrapping Birthday and Wedding presents . These totally unique bags can be used forever, cutting back the need for plastic and so colourful they will brighten up any occasion.

Extra Small: 4x5'/ 10x12cm
Small: 7.5'x8'/ 18x20cm
Medium: 8.5x9.5'/ 23x26cm
Large: 11.5'x17'/ 30x40cm

Material: 100% Upcycled Saris from Silk/Cotton and Polyester

The story behind our Greenfrogindia upcycled sari sling bag

All saris are collected locally here in India by ourselves they are then thoroughly washed and sorted by pattern, colour and fabric and cut and stitched by ourselves and members of our team who are based where we run our cycling tours in India. Each and every part of the sari is used, nothing is wasted from the borders that make our purses to the small left over materials that make our much loved gift and jewellery bags. ,

Material: 100% Upcycled Saris from Silk/Cotton and Polyester

Care: Machine wash in cold (30¬∞) water.

We are happy to take any order or if you need any specific colour or size combination then please message me

For further adventures in the world of upcycling and authentic Indian crafts visit us

This looks stunning on any table. These are handmade products and are done with a lot of precision. We use the best beads to create the design.
These placemats look great as a set on the dining table or as an individual mat in the living room or bedroom.

While creating these, we take extra care to tie all the knots and secure them properly.
These are ideal for the living room and dining room. This will add glamour, texture, and interest to your table.

name: Dog Rug Dog Shaped Rug Pet Rug for dog lovers Carpet for home decor, Livingroom. Small accent Rug, Cute Rugs and carpet
description:
This accent Dog Shaped Rug is best suitable for kids room, or just to give a additional look to the room,etc. This beautiful floor Dog Rug is best suitable as pop up rug in kids room, nursery, living room. This rug grabs attention and can be use as a pop up rug in your room. It is soft and is of authentic handmade in pure natural shop wool.
This rug is for pet lovers. :

Hand Tufted Dog Rug 2X3 Feet Woven Wool Area Rug

Material Used : Authentic Soft Sheep wool
Carpet Thickness: 20 MM ( approx)
Weaving Technique : Handmade
Size: 2X3 Feet
Place of Origin: India
Color: multicolored
Manufacturing time: 1 to 3 unit ( Ships in 3 days ) Contact for bulk order
Care: Dry Clean
Other size like 3x5feet, 4x6 feet, 5x8, 6x9 feet can also be custom made on request.

Genuine Hand Made in Rural India

Shipping Service : We offer free shipping Worldwide
Shipping FedEx International Priority / DHL Express

Hand Tufted Rug is made by punching threads of wool into a canvas that is stretched on a frame by using a hand operated tufting gun. Rug is made from Premium Lustrous Wool with backing of cotton cloth to make it highly durable. Made in India, this rug can last for 15-20 years without a problem. Raw material yarn of the rug is dyed using Azo free chemical dyes. Can be made in any sizes to best suit your space, this rug works best when paired with a rug pad underneath to prevent shifting and sliding.

name: Personalized Glissando Board and Mise En Place Boards | By Left Coast Original
description:
Usually ships in just 1-2 business days. Free domestic shipping!

Our Glissando Board and Mise En Place Boards are meticulously designed, expertly crafted, and lovingly finished by hand in our little workshop in Largo, Florida. We cut no corners and pride ourselves on excellence in every piece we produce.

Product Details :

Bring the French concept of Mise En Place (Everything In It's Place) into your home.

The Glissando:
Neatly chop your veggies and keep them from scattering with the included Slide Block. Its magnetic base keeps it properly in its place when not in use. Sliding your chopped, minced, or diced ingredients off the Glissando Board to the Mise En Place Board is so very satisfying.

Mise En Place Board:
Each of the 3 recesses are perfectly sized to accommodate chopped ingredients from the Glissando Board. Or use the Mise En Place Boards as a thoughtful serving tray for appetizers, charcuterie or hors d'oeuvres.

Our pieces are made from bamboo, an all natural material, so please be aware that there will be natural variations from one board to the next. The engraved area will show a natural variation in color and tone.

The bamboo used is cut from an FSC Certified forest. We are proud to offer 100% renewable materials for our personalized cutting boards! Not only is bamboo an incredibly strong and lightweight material for personalized cutting boards which age better than most tree woods after repeated use, but increased use of this eco-material helps cut carbon production.

Each engraving is burned deep into the board for a quality look and feel.


PRODUCT DIMENSIONS:

Each board is approx. 3/4in thick for a quality heft.

9x10 Glissando Board
12x16 Glissando Board
11.75x5.75 Mise En Place Board with 1/2in deep pockets


SETS:

Set 1- 9x10 Glissando Board + Engraved Mise En Place Board
Set 2 - 9x10 Glissando Board + Blank Mise En Place Board
Set 3 - 9x10 Glissando Board + Engraved Mise En Place Board + Blank Mise En Place Board
Set 4 - 12x16 Glissando + Engraved Mise En Place Board
Set 5 - 12x16 Glissando + Blank Mise En Place Board
Set 6 - 12x16 Glissando + Engraved Mise En Place Board + Blank Mise En Place Board
Set 7 - 9x10 Glissando + 12x16 Glissando + Engraved Mise En Place Board + Blank Mise En Place Board (All four boards set)

Each board is finished with a homemade board butter made from food safe mineral oil and beeswax. We do not treat our boards with sealants, varnishes, or dyes.

Board Care

We recommend hand washing and air drying. You can treat your board with mineral oil to keep it looking great forever. Our homemade board butter is available for purchase: https://www.etsy.com/listing/290148065/cutting-board-care-homemade-board-butter

Not Dishwasher safe. Do not soak

name: HandMade Unglazed Clay cup Set of 4 and 6/ Kulhad Tea & Coffee Cups, 100ml/ Antique Terracotta Drinking Kullar/ House Warming, Birthday Gift
description:
Introducing our exquisite Clay Tea Cups, crafted with care and passion, offering a unique experience for tea, coffee, and lassi enthusiasts. Made from 100% natural clay, these traditional Kulhad cups hold a capacity of 100 milliliters each, exuding the authentic aroma and taste of your favorite beverages.

Their organic brown color complements the natural essence of the clay material, creating an earthy and rustic charm. They guarantee a safe and healthy beverage consumption experience. Savor the genuine taste of Kulhad wali chai, as these cups preserve the pure raw form of the beverages.

Each cup is carefully designed to enhance your tea, chai, or coffee drinking experience, making every sip feel like a ceremonial ritual. Whether it's a special occasion, party, or just your tea time, these cups add a touch of elegance to your gatherings.

Embrace the essence of India with every sip, as these Kulhad cups provide a unique and traditional tea-making process. Enjoy the pleasure of preparing tea at home and sharing it with your loved ones, creating beautiful moments and memories.

Free from any harmful chemicals, these cups are reusable, washable ensuring convenience and ease of maintenance. Let nostalgia take over as you relish your favorite beverage in these mud brown Clay Kulhad cups, reminiscing about old times with friends and family.

Whether you're at home or work, these cups are always ready to accompany you, making every tea or coffee break a blissful and gratifying moment. Experience the allure of traditional Indian tea culture with these hand-crafted Kulhar mugs, reminiscent of the unglazed terracotta cups used on the vibrant streets of India.

Indulge in the simplicity and authenticity of these Clay Tea Cups, celebrating the true essence of tea and coffee in an ethnic and exquisite manner.

description:

name: EXPLOSIVE BATTLE board game. Tabletop fighting game, Birthday gift, Fun game for young and old, woodbots
description:
Handmade wooden board game.
t consists of two wooden characters controlled by two people. Each of the characters has a balloon instead of a head.
The essence of the game is to burst the opponent's balloon with the sword.

Includes a set character board with a 40cm by 25cm playing surface, 500 balloons, balloon pump and storage box.
This set contains everything you need to start playing and have a good time!

The set is made of high quality materials. It is designed in such a way that it would be convenient for you to control the characters.

How to play:

- using a pump, inflate balloons with a diameter of up to 7 cm and tie a balloon so that the air does not escape;
- place the ball in the slot on the character's torso;
- Hold the handles with both hands and place your index fingers on the triggers;
- by pressing the triggers, you control the character's sword and shield;
- Try to block your opponent's blows with your shield and strike with your sword to win this battle!

This is a very exciting game for adults and children. Ideal to play at home, as a gift for any occasion, for bar owners or for parties.

Children under 12 years old must play with an adult.

name: Safecracker 40 Math Wooden Puzzle
description:
Fantastic and unique math puzzle based on a 1911 design. The object is to get each of the 16 columns of numbers to add to 40 at the same time. Can you find the combination?

There is a base ring and then 4 rings that rotate on top. To complicate matters, the top sets of rings are all notched, so they will expose or hide some of the numbers on the ring below as the rings are turned. Makes for a lot of possible combinations! It essentially turns the 16 columns into 24 possible columns. Its quite a challenge. I recommend you watch the video link.
Beautifully made in USA at our Hudson, FL shop with highest quality cherry and maple and laser engraved numbers. It is 4.3' Dia' , ergonomically sized to fit the palm nicely.

Size: 4.4' in diameter and about .75' in height

It will come unsolved in the package, but I do include a picture of the solved puzzle. There is only 1 possible solution.
Copyright 2009 Creative Crafthouse LLC.

name: Montessori Phonetic Reading Blocks - Learn to Read - CVC Phonic Educational Toy for the Beginning Preschool Reader - 3-6 Year Olds
description:
Quality Montessori Phonetic Reading Blocks are perfect for the beginning reader. Your child will delight in twisting the blocks to discover new letters and lots of words, especially ones that rhyme. Take your child to the next level with tangible, self-corrected learning. Go from learning individual letter sounds to blending actual words. All words are in the dictionary, although some are less well known than others, and phonetic. The carefully chosen font matches other Montessori materials and helps your child transition easily between print and cursive. The blocks allow phonic practice with all 5 vowel sounds plus 13 different consonants, giving your reader a total of 80 CVC (consonant - vowel - consonant) words to discover and read. A fun educational toy to strengthen and improve your child's self-confidence with reading.

This language work is made to replace or compliment your Montessori Three Letter Phonetic Word Cards. The letters are written in lower case D'nealian print with red consonants and blue vowels in order to match the rest of your Montessori Language materials. A must have language work for the Montessori 3-6 year old primary and kindergarten classroom.

Set Includes:
5 Reading Block Rods w/ middle sounds A,E,I,O,& U. Each one is 4.5 inches long by 1 inch wide.
A list of definitions to keep your little ones informed.

Handmade with natural unfinished Maple wood, and non-toxic water based ink and glue.
CHOKING HAZARD: Small parts. Not for children under 3 years old.
ALL RIGHTS RESERVED. Made in the USA with Imported Parts.

Created with Love by a Certified Montessori Teacher.

EVERY PURCHASE SUPPORTS ONETREEPLANTED.ORG
